mutants.mutated_line: return [(os.path.join(root, name), name.split('.')[1]) for (root, dirs, files) in os.walk(directory_path) for name in files]
return [(os.path.join(root, name), name.split('.')[-1]) for (root, dirs, files) in os.walk(directory_path) for name in files]
return [(os.path.join(root, name), name.split('.')[1]) for (root, dirs, files) in os.walk(directory_path) for name in files]
return [(os.path.join(root, name), name.split('')[0]) for (root, dirs, files) in os.walk(directory_path) for name in files]
